name: Delfino AI
headline: Generative AI for administrative automation in healthcare
description: Delfino AI helps automate the repetitive phone calls that providers' offices make to payors

founders.name: Sneh Patel, Founder
founders.description: Sneh has a Doctorate in Pharmacy and MBA from Harvard.  She previously worked at McKinsey and an NEA-backed startup.

founders.name: Kimberly McManus, Founder
founders.description: Kimberly’s expertise in consumer health comes from leading a data science team at 23andMe. She has a Bachelor’s degree from MIT, and a Master’s degree in Biomedical Informatics and a Ph.D. in Biology from Stanford University. She’s published over ten papers in genomics, healthcare and machine learning and holds one patent, with three patents pending.

# Delfino AI
helps automate repetitive phone calls 
to payors ​
[Watch a Demo](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/m.youtube.com/watch?v=xey5_hRrVTQ>)
![soundwave5_edited.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/26b4af_43372fcd02a84584b060ce912356308e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_490,h_477,al_c,lg_1,q_85,enc_avif,quality_auto/26b4af_43372fcd02a84584b060ce912356308e~mv2.png)
## Example Call Types 
that you can request:
Eligibility and benefit 
verification
Prior authorization: requirement checks, status checks
Claim status inquiry
## Our AI-powered platform can navigate IVRs, wait on hold and have a conversation with a live person
![Keyboard](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_fb41b90fe0844d7a960e511fe09be632~mv2.jpeg/v1/fill/w_539,h_418,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/11062b_fb41b90fe0844d7a960e511fe09be632~mv2.jpeg)
## Just make your call request and let us take over
[Learn More](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/www.delfino.ai>)
## Benefits
##### Save time
Redirect your resources to higher value add tasks 
##### Maintain knowledge
Help prevent loss of knowledge as team members change
##### Create flexibility 
Scale support as needed
[Watch a Demo](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/m.youtube.com/watch?v=xey5_hRrVTQ>)
## How it works
Make your call request
Send requests with the patient information and questions you want answered by the payor
(e.g., Is the provider in network?, What is the copay?)
We will place the call
Our AI-powered platform will call the payor to ask the requested questions. If for any reason our AI can't complete the call, our human fallback team will step in to ensure you receive the required results
We will share the answers
Answers to your requested questions will be shared back with you
[Book a Meeting](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/calendly.com/sneh-hhw/30min>)
Watch a Demo
[Watch Demo Now](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/m.youtube.com/watch?v=xey5_hRrVTQ>)
## Team
Our leadership team has graduated from:
![stanford.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/26b4af_78c1fb21a7484b988fa08411a2d86bee~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_39,h_29,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/stanford.png)
![MIT-Logo.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/4b7756_9c0f3b7833b349f7ab925c59516cdbd4~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_0,y_278,w_3840,h_1605/fill/w_70,h_29,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/MIT-Logo.png)
![hbs.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/26b4af_7f055df053b74e48886b394399f4ffdf~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_70,h_29,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/hbs.jpg)
## HIPAA Compliance
We use Vanta to help monitor and maintain compliance. 
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/4b7756_2c402891eab34c4786c675be227eb81e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_166,h_166,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/4b7756_2c402891eab34c4786c675be227eb81e~mv2.png)
Delfino AI
[Privacy Policy](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/www.delfino.ai/privacy>)
©2023 by delfino AI

generated_description:
**Delfino AI: Revolutionizing Administrative Tasks in Healthcare**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the robust San Francisco Bay Area, **Delfino AI** is a promising startup that's tackling a persistent issue in healthcare: repetitive administrative tasks, particularly phone calls to payors. Born out of the Y Combinator Batch S22, this two-person team is on a mission to implement generative AI for automating these time-consuming duties, giving healthcare providers more bandwidth to focus on patient care.

### What Does Delfino AI Do?

Delfino AI's initial focus was on streamlining the administrative labyrinth by automating routine phone calls that healthcare providers make to insurance payors. Imagine not having to stay on hold or repeat the same eligibility questions again and again. Their AI-powered platform can navigate automated systems (IVRs), hold the line, and directly converse with live agents. Users simply send their call requests—like questions about patient eligibility or claim statuses—and let Delfino handle the rest. If the AI hits any snags, their helpful human fallback team steps in to ensure you still get the answers you need.

### Key Features and Benefits

1. **Time Savings**: By automating routine calls, providers can reallocate resources to higher-value tasks that enhance patient care.
   
2. **Knowledge Retention**: As teams shift and evolve, Delfino helps maintain essential operational knowledge, reducing information loss.
   
3. **Flexible Scaling**: The service can be scaled according to the needs of the healthcare organization, creating flexibility as demand changes.

### Compliance and Security

Delfino AI takes compliance seriously, utilizing Vanta to help monitor HIPAA adherence, ensuring that patient data is handled safely and securely.

### The Team Behind Delfino AI

While currently a small team of two, Delfino AI’s leaders boast impressive credentials from prestigious institutions like Stanford and MIT. It suggests that while they are lean, they bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to their work.

If you're a healthcare provider tired of drowning in repetitive calls to payors, Delfino AI might just be the lifebuoy you need. [Watch their demo](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/m.youtube.com/watch?v=xey5_hRrVTQ>) to see their AI in action, or [book a meeting](https://www.delfino.ai/<https:/calendly.com/sneh-hhw/30min>) to explore how easily they can integrate into your operations.

For more information, visit their [website](https://www.delfino.ai/). 

In a world where time is the one resource we can’t generate more of, Delfino AI stands out as a tool that not only saves time but enhances the overall efficiency of healthcare delivery.
